comments.body: Fixed, thanks for pointing it out.

description:
Line 1078 of JNDIRealm.java contains the following comment:
// Bugzilla 32267

The bug # is actually 32269.  It will be useful to be able to search bugzilla by
bug # for the reason for the fix.
summary: Incorrect bug # reference in comment for fix in JNDIRealm
